成分: THE EMPIRICAL FORMULA OF TYLOSIN PHOSPHATE ISC46H77O17.H3PO4 CARRY OUT THE METHOD FOR HPLC. THE CONTENT OFTYLOSIN A IN THE SUBSTANCE BEING EXAMINED IS NOT LESS THAN 80%.CARRY OUT THE BIOLOGICAL ASSAY OF ANTIBIOTICS, THE UPPER FIDUCIALLIMIT OF ERROR IS NOT LESS THAN 800 UNITS PER MG, CALCULATED WITHREFERENCE TO THE DRIED SUBSTANCE.
